name: The haunting of paper doll house [Remastered]
name_original: The haunting of paper doll house [Remastered]
description:
Submission for the "Remastered Game Jam".

Originally this game was developed for the jam "Github Game Off 2022" and can be found here:

The haunting of paper doll house by Evengy (itch.io)

Updates - Control system has been reworked, settings menu added, in some places missing materials added as well.

Please feel free to leave a feedback :)

Controls 

Move - WASD

Interactable objects are highlighted in close proximity and can be clicked with left mouse button. 

Pickable objects show "E" (press E to pick up)

Camera controls can be set up in Settings

Credits

All sounds are from Unity asset store

Game logic and all Assets are created from scratch for this jam.  

Tools: Unity, Paint (most assets are hand-drawn)

Team size: 1
